site.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.

unknowns.question: How much business logic should be in the browser?
How do you get the learning versus creating balance right?
How do you optimise learning across an organisation as it grows?
What are the opportunities for "Baby Boomers" to use tech?
What is best practice for updating node modules?
What is the relationship between isolation and innovation?
What is the importance of myth, What is myth?
What will define "a team" in an era when traditional organisational boundaries between employee and customer become blurred with geographical proximity irrelevant?

externalProvoke.excerpt: You cannot control events. You can control your process
externalProvoke.html:
You cannot control events. You can control your process

How often do you get stuck in an infinite loop with a problem? Then just by explaining the problem to someone else a light goes off and the path to navigate a solution becomes clear.

From the moment we enter the system we are given information to absorb into knowledge. But when are we taught how to learn? My breakthroughs never came from a teacher but from peers that defined the problem from their perspective and wrapped their solution in a story with a context we both understood. My observation since has been that good problem solvers do have strong intellects, but it is the way they look at problems and their methods for breaking the problem that really differentiates them and where the really valuable lessons are.

The theory

In an age of instant knowledge via search we have become too Solution Focused. To to really evolve our position in life by growing knowledge we should first swim upstream and find out what the problem is from different perspectives to confront our own dogma and then affirming where we stand.

Dreamineering is about developing processes that looks at the meta and the matter of problem solving by helping people to share and evolve thought processes that resonate by cutting down thoughts to memorable haiku that enscapsulate the big picture whilst resonating with truth.

The dream is that this will help people and organizations find their purpose and enable new collaborations that will help advance our ability to solve problems for good and for profit.

How do you stay on track?

To resonate is key. Cutting your thought processes down to haiku should be difficult but the reward deeper understanding of your problem and purpose as your haiku evolve. If you can achieve resonance with your haiku at the least your communication will be clearer. But then science indicates it could also make you happier.

Maybe every process in life has a natural frequency and when you resonate with an activity you are in harmony with frequency of the process to achieve flow? I don’t know anything about that. What I do know is that, when you get the words right, it feels right.

The other benefit is you can use your haiku like neural shortcuts to move yourself into the required mindset to guide you through actions you need to take.

Whatever you do, you are contantly forming and selling yourself micro-stories as you process existence, eventually these micro-stories string together to become the substance of your life.

You can’t tell your life’s story in advance but you can decide which micro-stories you use to process it. I hope dreamineering will provide micro-stories that resonate, because small things tend to evolve into big things.

externalProvoke.haikuAction: Where do you want to be?
externalProvoke.excerpt: Wherever you want to be it helps to know where you are coming from and what your pain points are so we know what obstacles we need to overcome and tackle the most important issues first.
externalProvoke.html:
Wherever you want to be it helps to know where you are coming from and what your pain points are so we know what obstacles we need to overcome and tackle the most important issues first.

Everyone looks at problems or opportunities differently Dreamineering takes the approach of adopting the view points of four major archetypes the Philsopher that asks questions, the dreamer that wonders why, the realist that asks what value, and the engineer makes these dreams a reality.

The crucial bit is finding a common language to communicate around solving a problem and getting the balance right so these mindset can work together more productively.

If you are someone that needs an off the shelf software solution step this way otherwise keep on trucking. If you are wanting something bespoke the dreamineering approach is to use your specifications to drive the evolution of your project.

If you are a fellow engineer, someone that can build things with the web then this is the way I work. I’d be happy to have collaborators if this interests you.

If you are curious to know more about me, you can take a walk down my memory lane. Probably best not operate heavy machinery while taking this is, but could be handy material if you are struggling to nod off in the evenings.

externalProvoke.haikuThought: Do people get what you mean?
externalProvoke.haikuAction: Can you say what you mean?
externalProvoke.excerpt: If you think about what you are communicate, how closely does it reflect what you feel you are all about?
externalProvoke.html:
If you think about what you are communicate, how closely does it reflect what you feel you are all about?

Whether you are designing for the web or your dream home. Your words will carry your intentions and as 80% of you won’t read this line you especially need to craft headlines that resonate with truth and purpose. Words have hidden meaning so make them count.

There are lot of good reasons to learn how to tell your story from the perpective of holding your audience’s attention. But the side effect of discovering who you are will be of far greater value.

Fetch a refreshing beverage, a pencil and pad, then listen to these designers explain how their words lead their design process Jeffrey Zeldman, Ryan Singer/.

externalProvoke.haikuAction: Your future is in your hands
externalProvoke.excerpt: Where are you now? What are you looking for? Are you seeking to entertain your mind? Need some facts? or do you urgently need to take some action? Whatever it is you will want to fulfill your desires quickly.
externalProvoke.html:
Where are you now? What are you looking for? Are you seeking to entertain your mind? Need some facts? or do you urgently need to take some action? Whatever it is you will want to fulfill your desires quickly.

If someone approaches you through the web what do you most want them to know and do next? How easy are you making that for them. Context is everything because it shapes meaning in all communication.

It will take time to build this knowledge but one step you can take is to focus on getting your message over on mobile because this will force you to focus your attention due and as research shows No mobile site = lost customers

You can catch a big fish on a small hook, but you can’t catch a small fish on a big hook

Explore mobile user trends then use Google’s mobile playbook to evaluate where you stand.

  • Focus your value proposition
  • Create mobile-first destinations
  • Make mobile accountable
  • Drive branding specific to mobile

Do you think existing web navigation systems do a good job meeting the contextual needs of different mindsets? Shouldn’t navigation be more an interactive experience? Like having an old friend showing you around a city they have moved to. With the dreamineering design process we would use haiku to plan your content and create navigtion trails through your experience based on the mindset of the user.

externalProvoke.excerpt: Technology should provide structure that enable flow by indicating a clear direction but with the flexibility to swiftly alter course to match your desires. Technology should free you to get on with mastering the gifts that make you human because in the end...
externalProvoke.html:
Technology should provide structure that enable flow by indicating a clear direction but with the flexibility to swiftly alter course to match your desires. Technology should free you to get on with mastering the gifts that make you human because in the end…

It’s not about the bike.

If you know you message and you got systems that flow belief will be your reward and with that you have no boundaries.

Evaluate your options

internalProvoke.haikuThought: Ever been stuck wrestling with a problem?
internalProvoke.excerpt: Have you ever been stuck wrestling with a problem that kept turning over and over in your head but you just couldn't make the breakthrough? Then you chat with someone that asks a simple question that makes you see things from a fresh perspective and light goes off and you are able to navigatge a new path through your problem.
internalProvoke.html:
Have you ever been stuck wrestling with a problem that kept turning over and over in your head but you just couldn’t make the breakthrough? Then you chat with someone that asks a simple question that makes you see things from a fresh perspective and light goes off and you are able to navigatge a new path through your problem.

From the moment we enter school we are given information to absorb into knowledge. But when are we taught how to learn? My breakthroughs never come from a teacher but from peers that defined the problem from their perspective and told a story for how they solved the problem. This is completely unscientific but my observation has been that good problem solvers do have strong intellects, but it is the way the look at problems and their methods for approaching the problem that really differentiates them.

Dreamineering seeks to address the meta and the matter of problem solving by helping people to share the thought processes and also connect with other’s thought paths that resonate with them.

The dream is that this will help people and organizations find their purpose and enable new collaborations that will help advance our ability to solve problems for good and for profit.

The theory

Evolving your thinking requires considering your problem from the the perspectives of the Philosopher, the Dreamer, the Engineer and the Realist.

Then creating two different type of thought loop to explore your options. Use a provocation loop to challenge your dogma and inspiration for generating ideas which you capture in an affirmation loop which are cut down to memorable haiku that enscapsulate the big picture whilst resonating with truth.

How do you stay on track?

To resonate is key. Cutting your thought processes down to haiku will be difficult but the reward is a deeper understanding of your problem as your haiku evolve.

Then you can use your haiku like neural shortcuts to move yourself into the right frame of mind or as guides through actions you need to take.

More importantly you will be able to communicate with greater clarity where you are coming from, where you are and where you intend to go which goes along way to gaining the support of others.

Whether you are pitching your startup, planning a family vacation or playing a round of golf using dreamineering will help you stay connected with your sense of purpose.

internalProvoke.haikuThought: Do people get what you mean?
internalProvoke.excerpt: Whether you are designing for the web or your dream home the words you use will carry your intentions. Then 80% of you won't read this so make those headlines work first.
internalProvoke.html:
Whether you are designing for the web or your dream home the words you use will carry your intentions. Then 80% of you won’t read this so make those headlines work first.

If you think about what you are communicating, how close does it reflect what you are all about?

Gather your pad and pencil, grab something to drink then listen to why designers need to craft their words

internalAffirm.heading: About
internalAffirm.excerpt: The dreams here are not about luxury lifestyles you see celebrated on MTV but the practical act of trying to imagine where you want to be and how you solve a problem getting there.
internalAffirm.html:
The dreams here are not about luxury lifestyles you see celebrated on MTV but the practical act of trying to imagine where you want to be and how you solve a problem getting there.

When I worked in telecoms specifically with developing software for running the business. People were always dreaming up ideas for solutions that would make things better from their perspective. But it was my task to tell the whole story by investigating problem and solution from others perspectives, following different streams from start to finish to justify the business case for development.

Now I am looking for people that want to build stuff. The idea is that Dreamineering will help those people to think with greater clarity about where they are in. The true nature of the problems that are worth solving and what opportunities a solution would provide others.

Dreamineering would also provide infrastucture in the form of software that works together as stackmates to help run the enterprise (in the old sense of the word) whether that is climbing everest, building a house or running a business.

Anything where you need to understand what and where point A and B are and how to navigate betweeen the two where the web can help you follow and tell your story.

In essence it comes down to interpreting the current situation from different perspectives with the ability to learn quickly and take decisive effective action. Additionally I have experienced frustration with do it this way blogging and online learning resources that fall short on context. I think uou learn a lot more when you have the big picture to explore in their entirety but where you can choose to follow paths of interest.

How to do you make the most of reading something that resonates with you? What are you processes? How do you make the most of this new information? Maybe you think that was good I should remember that and file it away for future reference. But imagine if the content was created with the intent it could be merged into your workflow?

I’ve been thinking about these problems since I worked as a mechanical engineer I started this project because I have too many ideas and it would be nice if one could happen or at the very least help others to dreamineer their ideas.

internalAffirm.heading: About
internalAffirm.lens: Describe where you are coming from in looking at this problem

haikuStartups.mainQuote: If I had 20 days to solve a problem, I would spend 19 days to define it.
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: What type of problem is it?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: What skills do you need to solve the problem?
haikuStartups.main04CheckLink: What type of thinking is needed?
haikuStartups.excerpt: The biggest problem is not solving problems but identifying the hidden problems and learning why they exist. Explore your frustration to identify the true nature of your problems.
haikuStartups.html: The biggest problem is not solving problems but identifying the hidden problems and learning why they exist. Explore your frustration to identify the true nature of your problems.

haikuStartups.haikuThought: What do you want to achieve?
haikuStartups.mainQuote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: How will you make a difference?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Dreams are free, but it takes work to refine them into something useful. Capture inspiration when it passes through. don't let ideas die in your head.
haikuStartups.html:
Dreams are free, but it takes work to refine them into something useful. Capture inspiration when it passes through. don’t let ideas die in your head.

Engineer a picture that clarifies intent and builds desire to strive beyond your current capabilities and keeps you moving through the tough times.

haikuStartups.mainQuote: No business plan survives first contact with customers
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: What do think it is? How will you recognise it? What will you be willing to sacrifice?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: What will make the effort worthwhile?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Develop empathy for your customer by rephrasing the problems they have with doing their job with an emphasis on identifying performance metrics that would indicate success or failure when designing a solution.
haikuStartups.html:
Develop empathy for your customer by rephrasing the problems they have with doing their job with an emphasis on identifying performance metrics that would indicate success or failure when designing a solution.

How big do you want to be? Your success will depend greatly on your definition of fulfillment.

haikuStartups.mainQuote: Stop trying to "network" in the traditional business sense, and instead build up the number and depth of your friendships
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: How do you think of them? Why do you want to help them? How do you want to be perveived?
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: What defines great teams? Who is a team you admire? How could you try to be like them?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: Is the work you are doing aligned with your culture?
haikuStartups.excerpt: How can you build a culture based upon shared learning and that removes barriers to turn customers into collaborators?
haikuStartups.html: How can you build a culture based upon shared learning and that removes barriers to turn customers into collaborators?

haikuStartups.mainQuote: Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: Are you trying to do too much?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Understand the function of the job you are working on by clearly specifying all inputs and desired outputs.
haikuStartups.html: Understand the function of the job you are working on by clearly specifying all inputs and desired outputs.

haikuStartups.mainQuote: Those who look for the laws of Nature as a support for their works collaborate with the creator
haikuStartups.main01CheckInstruction: Can people easily pick up work where other leave off?
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: How do your structures enable flow?
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: Have you got checks in place that enable experimentation?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: How can you reduce technical/political debt?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Have enough structure to enable flow and communicate intent but flexible enough to allow for creativity in solving problems with new ways of thinking.
haikuStartups.html: Have enough structure to enable flow and communicate intent but flexible enough to allow for creativity in solving problems with new ways of thinking.

haikuStartups.mainQuote: Good design is as little design as possible
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: How are you avoiding common mistakes?
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: Are you making it easier to make good decisions?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: How are you delivering an emotional connection?

haikuStartups.heading: Reality
haikuStartups.mainQuote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination
haikuStartups.main01CheckInstruction: How do you qualify trust in your data?
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: Do your metrics tell a story?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: Is all your endeavour worth the effort? Do projections for breakeven, payback, net present value, internal rate of return hold up in reality?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Setup feedback loops to capture as much data as you can.
haikuStartups.html:
Setup feedback loops to capture as much data as you can.

When creating metrics also agree premediated decisions that should be enacted if certain thresholds are met.

Make sure your data is accurate and representative of the full story and think over results slowly

haikuStartups.mainQuote: All I know is that I know nothing
haikuStartups.main01CheckInstruction: List your known unknowns and record your unknown unknown as the occur
haikuStartups.main02CheckInstruction: How can you improve the ability across the organisation to learn and teach new ideas?
haikuStartups.main03CheckInstruction: How can make the most of what the universe throws at you? Is there a way to be better prepared mentally?
haikuStartups.main04CheckInstruction: How can you get your brain into top working order?
haikuStartups.excerpt: Maintain curiosity losing your ego to ask the dumb questions as most problems exist only because the simple questions remain ignored.
haikuStartups.html: Maintain curiosity losing your ego to ask the dumb questions as most problems exist only because the simple questions remain ignored.
